scripts.test-e2e-local: echo 'e2e testing against locally running service....' && AWS_PROFILE=tomn-personal STAGE=dev TEST_LOCAL=yes jest ./*.e2e.test.ts
scripts.test-e2e-dev: echo 'e2e testing against deployed dev endpoints...' && AWS_PROFILE=tomn-personal STAGE=dev jest ./*.e2e.test.ts
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && sls deploy --stage dev --profile tomn-personal
scripts.start: npm run build && SLS_DEBUG=* AWS_PROFILE=tomn-personal sls offline
